title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 ยง 215.4 - Method of disclosure of required information
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 ยง 215.4 - Method of disclosure of required information

State Regulations

All information required to be disclosed by this Part shall be set out conspicuously and in close conjunction with the statements to which such information relates or under appropriate captions of such prominence that it shall not be minimized, rendered obscure or presented in an ambiguous fashion or intermingled with the context of the advertisement so as to be confusing or misleading. Notes

R. & Regs. Tit. 11

215.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
